errors.error_description: Incorrect command syntax mixing installation command with setup approach description
correction_candidates: The best way to start setting up this tool is to use **pip** within a **virtualenv**.
The best way to start setting up this tool is to run **pip install -r requirements.txt** after creating a **virtualenv**.
The best way to start setting up this tool is to use **conda install** within a **conda environment**.
The best way to start setting up this tool is to execute **python setup.py install** in a **virtualenv**.
errors.golden_answer: The best way to start setting up this tool is to use **pip** within a **virtualenv**.
